summary: Following the theft of a postal-order, a fourteen-year old cadet is expelled from Naval College. To save the honour of the boy and his family, the pre-eminent barrister of the day is engaged to take on the might the Admiralty.
cast: Matthew Pidgeon|Rebecca Pidgeon|Gemma Jones|Nigel Hawthorne|Lana Bilzerian|Sarah Flind|Aden Gillett|Guy Edwards|Colin Stinton|Eve Bland|Sara Stewart|Perry Fenwick|Alan Polonsky|Jeremy Northam|Neil North|Chris Porter|Jim Dunk|Duncan Gould|Ian Soundy|John Grayson
keywords: family character name in title|parliament|military|engagement|royal naval academy
title: El caso Winslow
